    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public static void execute(java.lang.String sFolderToBeCleaned)
                    throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method simply deletes the contents of the folder to be cleaned up. And after that it deletes the folder itself.
        Parameters:
        sFolderToBeCleaned - String
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If the folder does not exits.
        java.io.IOException - If it is unable to delete the folder.

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(java.lang.String file)
                       throws DCMAApplicationException,
                              java.io.IOException
        This method deletes the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - String
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If the file does not exits.
        java.io.IOException - If it is unable to delete the file.
